FuncDef: Enables the support of specific management protocols over VPRN interfaces that terminate on Base routing context IPv4 and IPv6 interface addresses, including Base loopback and system addresses. Global Routing Table (GRT) leaking is used to enable visibility/access of the Base interface addresses in the VPRN. The supported protocols are Telnet, FTP, SNMP, and SSH (including applications that ride over SSH such as SCP and SFTP) and TACAS+.
